name: the night flight
description: Falling was a habit I practiced for more than twenty years. Falling incessantly in the years of my youth allowed me to learn to fly. Premature deaths, disapprovals, running without getting anywhere, believing you were right and crashing into a fallacy. I still remember those hard years, sometimes I have tenderness or some nostalgia for them. It must be because of them that I learned that when falling, while not touching the ground, one can also experience flight.
